column3: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.

We live between the act of awakening and the act of surrender. Each morning, we awaken to the light and the invitation to a new day in the world of time; each night, we surrender to the dark to be taken to play in the world of dreams where time is no more.
We must not let our passions destroy our dreams.
An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.

A lot of people put pressure on themselves and think it will be way too hard for them to live out their dreams. Mentors are there to say, 'Look, it's not that tough. It's not as hard as you think. Here are some guidelines and things I have gone through to get to where I am in my career.'
Lonesome. Lonesome. I know what it means. Here all by my lonesome, dreaming empty dreams. Weary. Weary at the close of day, wondering if tomorrow brings me joy or sorrow.
But are not the dreams of poets and the tales of travellers notoriously false?
We cast away priceless time in dreams, born of imagination, fed upon illusion, and put to death by reality.
You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
One of the most adventurous things left us is to go to bed. For no one can lay a hand on our dreams.
Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
The more you can dream, the more you can do.
You gotta have a dream. If you don't have a dream, how you gonna make a dream come true?
In bed my real love has always been the sleep that rescued me by allowing me to dream.
Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers.
Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead.
Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives.
Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
The work of an advertising agency is warmly and immediately human. It deals with human needs, wants, dreams and hopes. Its 'product' cannot be turned out on an assembly line.
We must look for ways to be an active force in our own lives. We must take charge of our own destinies, design a life of substance and truly begin to live our dreams.
Good dreams don't come cheap, you've got to pay for them and If you just dream when you're asleep this is no way for them to come alive... to survive.
I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.
Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.
Don't let your dreams be dreams.
Big dreams create the magic that stir men's souls to greatness.
You can't break my spirit, it's my dreams you take.
